data.text: Beautiful hotel and amazing staff. From the moment we were greeted by Mario at the reception desk, to the tremendous service by Zhanna at the Mood Rooftop Bar, our experience at The One was first class. The hotel is gorgeous and the room was fantastic. Great linens, sitting area and bathroom. Breakfast at the Somni Restaurant was delicious and very well prepared. The staff is first class and bellmen are well trained. The One made our stay in Barcelona very enjoyable and I would highly recommend.
data.title: The One is first class!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Dream19808909800,

Thank you very much for your lovely comment, it is a true pleasure reading it!

Our staff was delighted reading your compliments towards them and they were glad that they could make you enjoy your stay in our hotel even more.

We are glad that you enjoyed the hotel and its facilities. Hopefully we can welcome you soon again in our hotel.
Kindest regards,
owner_response.author: Guest Relation Manager The One Barcelona

data.text:
Brilliant hotel in a perfect location. A short walk to the main streets. The stay here was really nice. The rooms were well appointed for a city break and the staff were fantastic. Super friendly and happy to help at every opportunity. I’d highly recommend using the concierge service to help in getting good quality restaurant bookings. They really know their stuff. 
The hotel breakfast was nice and provided plenty. Don’t worry if you don’t use the hotels breakfast as there is plenty of coffee shops and bakery’s near by. 
Lovely rooftop bar and restaurant which does lovely food and great cocktails in a picture perfect setting. Highly recommend taking a trip up in the afternoon to see the city skyline. 
Would definitely return to this hotel when staying in Amsterdam
data.title: Perfect location with super friendly staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear King_Kier,

It was a pleasure to receive your kind review of your stay with us. 

We are delighted that you had a lovely stay and enjoyed our great location which enables our guests to easily discover our beautiful city and must-see attractions. 

We appreciate your kind words about our team members. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back on a future visit. 

Kindest regards.
owner_response.author: Guest Relation Manager The One Barcelona

data.text: We received a warm welcome from the staff upon arriving at the hotel on 3/8. They were all friendly to our 2 boys (ages 6 and 11) during our stay. The rooms were very clean and had a nice city view. They paid attention to the details in the room including all the 5-star amenities that you can think of (pencil-sharpener, full-size body cream, glass bottled water, plush robes/slippers...). What made our stay most enjoyable was the concierge crew. They gave us the best restaurant suggestions, helped make all the reservations (and even cancellations). And...a BIG shoutout to Enrique, he was super friendly, helpful, and attentive. In addition, the hotel location was superb, it was a short walk to many places. We would definitely stay there again!
data.title: one of the most luxurious accommodations in city center

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 126ccl,

Thank you so much for your review and nice comments about our Hotel.

We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay in The One and appreciated the luxury and comfort of our rooms.
We appreciate your kind words about our team members. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back on a future visit. 

Kindest regards.
owner_response.author: Guest Relation Manager The One Barcelona

data.text: We stayed The One for a family vacation in Barcelona. It is a terrific hotel:  starting from the moment we walked into to time of check out. The responsiveness of the staff, the friendliness of everyone working there was great. We had the family and junior suites:  wow!!  The rooms were very big, the beds were comfortable, and the decor was superb. Overall an excellent place to stay in Barcelona. Clean. High end finishes. And close to the major tourist attractions. Would highly recommend it
data.title: Hotel in Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear rickjotani,

It was a pleasure to receive your kind review of your stay with us.

We were very happy to read that you did enjoy our hotel and services and hope to have the pleasure to welcome you and your family on another vacation in Barcelona. Truly,
owner_response.author: Guest Relation Manager The One Barcelona

data.text: the best hotel I've ever stayed in. best part about it? the staff, super friendly and helpful. great location in the city. Cocktails amazing. will stay there again for sure. the roof top bar and pool is an amazing place to sit and relax after a long day
data.title: superb 5 star hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear A130QPjeffa,

Thank you very much for your lovely feedback regarding your stay in The One.

We are pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay and would like to thank you for your compliments to our staff, they are glad that they could help you enjoy your stay even more. 

On the other hand, we are glad that you enjoyed our Mood rooftop bar and pool as well, with the views all over the city.

Hopefully we can welcome you soon again.
Kindest regards,
owner_response.author: Guest Relation Manager The One Barcelona
